name: Sporethroat Exalter
description: A vessel for ranged invocation, the Exalter exhales clouds thick with purpose. Its lungs, restructured into fungal resonance chambers, pour living breath into distant places where blades cannot tread.
abilities:
Sporeburst on Crit (Passive):
When this model rolls a Critical Hit with a ranged attack, place a Bloom Marker at the target's location.
